title: Coronavirus travel: China bars foreign visitors as imported cases rise
description: From Saturday, foreigners will not be allowed into China - even if they have visas.
content:
Image copyrightAFP / GettyImage caption
 A queue at a fever clinic in Hubei province on Friday
China has announced a temporary ban on all foreign visitors, even if they have visas or residence permits.
The country is also limiting Chinese and foreign airli… [+1660 chars]
